name: Marine Defense Force 2084
description:
Play Marine Defense Force 2084! An underwater tower defense game currently in development.

Either sign up and login to play or select play as guest to get right into the bird bashing action!

When in game, click the clam on the left of the screen to select towers then left click to place onto the game grid.

Developed by:

Thomas Bickford - Thomasbickford1@aol.com

Ryan Cartualro - Ryan.Cartularo@gmail.com

Andrew Fay Matseas - andrewafay@gmail.com
